column4: i have local mirrors of both the feisty and gutsy repositories. is there any way i can get my feisty box to upgrade to gutsy using those?
i believe it is as easy as update, upgrade, dist-upgrade
so, do i put my gutsy mirrors in sources.list, update, and tell it to dist-upgrade?
there may be some gconf stuff that may not update correctly though.  and you may want to let the system recreate your gnome settings
